name: Turbulence (Grizzly Cogs)
description:
Help Joseph-Michel and his dog, Bart, to drive their hot air balloon. You need to catch every propane balloon in order to keep the balloon flying. But watch out the flying bombs!
You can only make the balloon go up or down. The balloon will move right or left depending on the air flows.

Controls :
- Arrows : Go up or down
- R key : Restart level

Original soundtrack :
Soundtrack is available for free here:  
https://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/album/turbulence
(could be use as nice ringtones)

Credits :
- Boris Warembourg : GD, LD, dev, music, sounds, pixel art.
- Font by Gizmo199
- Nokia sound sample by Virtually Conducted (used for musics and sfxs)
Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5.
